TopicTitle: Does a threads url change when it is moved

Articles.Content:
Just wondering what happens when a thread is moved; does it's url change and how does it effect those who are following it? 

Reason I'm asking is I think I'd like to move my [KerbalX.com thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93548-KerbalX-com-craft-sharing-site-with-Auto-Mod-Detection-and-Search-By-Mod-feature) out of "Add-on Releases" and into "Tools and Applications". It's not really an Add on (and it's prefixed with Plugin which gives the wrong idea I think), I think it would be happier living in tools and apps, what do you think?

I just wanted to check about the url because I'd need to update the links to it on the site if it changes, and I want to make sure that those who are following it don't loose track of it.

thanks!
The url will remain the same ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> The url will remain the same ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Sweet. Could you please move it for me? Thanks! 

([thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93548-KerbalX-com-craft-sharing-site-with-Auto-Mod-Detection-and-Search-By-Mod-feature), :move\_to => "Tools and Applications")
HA! I've been wondering this ever since I joined the forum lol.
